story:
Short Summery                  

We must save ourselves from ourselves.        למידע בעברית גללו למטה 

The main idea of the show is to put an "optimistic "point of view on a very serious and sad global plastic problem. 
Its hard. I know. 
This issue is being ignore by too many people that can't deal with the ugly truth. 
9 Israeli and number of  international artists took on themselves this project to raise the awareness and to contribute to changing ways of lives.
50% off the total event income will be donate to two organizations dealing with cleaning and environmental saving. 
Any sum collected and not used for the exhibition will be donated as well.

The event will take place in Bat Yam, Israel, @hagalsheli arena 23.05.19

What We Need & What You Get

The amount we need to realize our vision is 10,000$. 
Any excess will be donated to organizations that are caring, explain and cleaning the environment.
The money collected will serve us to establish, organize and operate the exhibition.

So why do we need the money?

•    Building walls
•    Furniture
•    Advertising
•    Additional products for the exhibition and artists
•    Amplification
•    Printing equipment
•    Food and drinks for the opening evening
•    Art materials

 

And what do you get?

You can donate any amount of money you want or choose one of our perks.

5$ donation:
•    Virtual Hug

10$ donation (and above)
•    We will recycle a bottle or box in your name
•    Virtual Hug 

30$ donation
•    Wild Plastic event T-shirt
•    We will recycle a bottle or box in your name
•    Virtual Hug 

100$ donation
•    Wild Plastic Kit
•    We will recycle a bottle or box in your name
•    Virtual Hug 

200$ donation
•    Small, original painting of your choice
•    We will recycle a bottle or box in your name
•    Virtual Hug 

500$ donation
•    Mystery Artist Box
•    We will recycle a bottle or box in your name
•    Virtual Hug 

Support the Artists

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute that doesn't mean you can't help:
•    Help us spread the word about our fundraising campaign.
•    Post the link on social media or tell your friends you think might be into what we’re up to.
•    Choose one of the 4 following options and start living "Plastic Free" lifestyle.

 

Collaborations:

-

תקציר האירוע

אנחנו חייבים להציל את עצמינו מעצמנו.

הרעיון המרכזי של התערוכה היא להציג באור אופטימי בעיה עצובה וגלובאלית,
שימוש יתר בפלסטיק והשפעתו על הסביבה. זה קשה. אני יודע.
אנשים רבים מתעלמים מבעיה זו כי אינם יכולים להתמודד עם האמת ה"מכוערת".

9 אמנים מהארץ ועוד מספר אמנים מחו"ל לקחו על עצמם משימה קשה זו,
להעלות את המודעות לבעיה ולתרום לניקיון הפלסטיק מעולמינו ושינוי אורחות חיינו.

50% מכלל ההכנסות של האירוע יועברו כתרומה לארגונים הדואגים ומנקים את הסביבה.

כל סכום שייאסף ולא יעשה בו שימוש למען התערוכה ייתרם כולו.

האירוע יתקיים בחוף הרביירה בת ים, ישראל. מתחם "הגל שלי".
התערוכה תיפתח לקהל הרחב בתאריך 23.05.19 בשעה 20:00 ותיסגר במוצאי שבת 26.05.19.
(הפעילות בימים שישי ושבת תותאם לזמני כניסה ויציאת השבת)

 

מה אנחנו צריכים ומה אתם מרוויחים?

הסכום שנחוץ לנו בכדי להגשים את חזוננו הינו 10,000$. 
כל סכום מעבר ייתרם לארגונים הדואגים, מסבירים ומנקים את הסביבה.

הכסף שייאסף ישמש אותנו להקמה, ארגון ותפעול התערוכה.

אז למה אנחנו צריכים כסף?

 

  • בנית קירות

  • ריהוט

  • פרסום

  • מוצרים נלווים לתערוכה ולאמנים

  • הגברה

  • ציוד הדפסה

  • אוכל ומשקאות לערב הפתיחה

  • חומרי יצירה

 

ומה אתם מרוויחים?

אתם יכולים לתרום כל סכום כסף שתרצו או לבחור באחת ההטבות שלנו.

 

 

בתרומה של 5$

  • חיבוק וירטואלי

בתרומה של 10$ (ומעלה)

  • נמחזר בקבוק או אריזה בשמכם

  • חיבוק וירטואלי

בתרומה של 30$

  • חולצת אירוע של Wild Plastic

  • נמחזר בקבוק או אריזה בשמכם

  • חיבוק וירטואלי

בתרומה של 100$

  • ערכת Wild Plastic

  • נמחזר בקבוק או אריזה בשמכם

  • חיבוק וירטואלי

בתרומה של 200$

  • ציור קטן, מקורי לבחירה

  • נמחזר בקבוק או אריזה בשמכם

  • חיבוק וירטואלי

בתרומה של 500$

  • Mystery Artist Box

  • נמחזר בקבוק או אריזה בשמכם

  • חיבוק וירטואלי

 

דרכים נוספות בהן תוכלו לעזור:

גם אם אתם לא יכולים לתרום, זה לא אומר אתם לא יכולים לעזור:

  • עזרו לנו להפיץ את מסע גיוס הכספים שלנו.

  •  פרסמו את הקישור במדיה החברתית או ספרו לחברים שלכם, אולי הם יכולים
    לתמוך במה שאנחנו עושים.

  • בחרו אחת מארבע האפשרויות הבאות והתחילו לחיות 

בשיתוף עם:

story:
We want to make you happy. The goal of the Free Squirt art is simply to create a feeling of love and bonding between man and octopoda. Please help us bring this art to the playa in 2018.
 
Although our art is funded by the Burning Man Arts Honorarium, a portion of the funds must be raised by the public as part of the participation expectation. As such our budget shortfall must be met by this crowdfunding campaign. Thank you!
 
Your dollars will help to create that magical feeling we have at Burning Man. Without your support, the art can not make it out to the desert. By giving, you are helping to make it happen.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

We are always looking for volunteers both for the building of the art and for helping with the art on playa. Feel free to drop us a note if you are interested in participating.

Thank you from the

"Free Squirt" Camp
story_txt:
We want to make you happy. The goal of the Free Squirt art is simply to create a feeling of love and bonding between man and octopoda. Please help us bring this art to the playa in 2018. Although our art is funded by the Burning Man Arts Honorarium, a portion of the funds must be raised by the public as part of the participation expectation. As such our budget shortfall must be met by this crowdfunding campaign. Thank you! Your dollars will help to create that magical feeling we have at Burning Man. Without your support, the art can not make it out to the desert. By giving, you are helping to make it happen. 
Other Ways You Can Help
We are always looking for volunteers both for the building of the art and for helping with the art on playa. Feel free to drop us a note if you are interested in participating.
Thank you from the
"Free Squirt" Camp

story:
I'm the guy that sold 1,000 raccoon penis bones!

Howdy howdy. My name is Steve, and I want to be the guy that sold 1,000 raccoon penis bones. I have a box full of raccoon penis bones. I want to put 'em in a plastic tube and sell them to you. Everyone told me there's no way I can do it. I had a Kickstarter running, and even had lots of great press about my project - and Kickstarter shut me down.

Why? They were scared. They don't want me to be the guy that sold 1,000 raccoon penis bones. Big Crowdfunding and Big Raccoon Penis Bones got worried about this slick new kid on the block.

Well tough tush, "The Man." I'm back on IndieGoGo, and I'm going to sell 1,000 freaking raccoon penis bones. Remember that time I sold 19,843 stick figure cat drawings?

Raccoons have penis bones?

They do! In fact, most mammals do. The fact that humans don't have baculum (yay science!) makes us kind of weird. Here's an illustration of what a raccoon penis bone looks like after I put it in a plastic tube:

Some people make art out of raccoon penis bones. They turn them into earrings, necklaces, and other forms of jewelry. If you do a search for raccoon penis bone on Etsy, you'll find all sorts of people using them in creative ways.

I'm not so interested in turning raccoon penis bones into works of art. I just wanna put 'em in a plastic tube and sell them to you.

Your contribution will go toward sourcing some excellent plastic tubes and end caps. You're just gonna love your raccoon penis bone in a plastic tube.

What if I don't sell 1,000 raccoon penis bones?

I know my theme song and video are both a bit presumptuous. Their validity hinge on being able to tip my Kickstarter and sell all 1,000 raccoon penis bones. This is an all-or-nothing fundraiser. I'm either the guy who SOLD 1,000 raccoon penis bones, or I'm the guy who HAS 1,000 raccoon penis bones. I had gained some solid momentum through my BANNED Kickstarter project, but once that was suspended I lost all of my new customers. So I'm back to square one.

Here's what they look like:

My fate, and my reputation, is in your hands. Please help me dodge humiliation and support my goal of being the guy who sold 1,000 raccoon penis bones.

Follow our progress!

Whether or not you pledge, be sure to follow along on our Facebook page. We'll post links to press coverage, and answer all of your questions about raccoon penis bones in plastic tubes.

story:
"Italië walgt van barbaren"

Laat zien dat Nederland meeleeft met Italië door geld in te zamelen voor het herstel van de Barcaccia-fontein. Wij zijn geen barbaren!

Kunsthistorici van de gemeente Rome hebben vrijdagochtend de Barcaccia-fontein op de Piazza di Spagna onderzocht, waar Feyenoord-supporters donderdag hebben huisgehouden. De experts hebben „permanente beschadigingen” vastgesteld. Er ontbreken stukjes van de marmeren beelden. De deskundigen reppen over een „verkrachting” van het meesterwerk van Bernini

„De hooligans hebben zelfs op de kostbare marmer geürineerd”, aldus de Corriere

De fontein was pas enkele maanden geleden wit en schoon opgeleverd na een restauratie van 2 ton. Persbureau ANSA noemt de fontein een „juweel”. Paus Urbanus VIII gaf de Fontana della Barcaccia (Fontein van de slechte boot) in 1627 in opdracht. Het motief zou zijn geïnspireerd door een schip dat tijdens de overstroming van de Tiber in 1598 op de Piazza di Spagna strandde. Het schip in de fontein lijkt inderdaad te zinken. Het is de eerste fontein in de kunstgeschiedenis die in zijn geheel als beeldhouwwerk is uitgevoerd. Eerder hadden fonteinen geometrische vormen.

story:
ABOUT ME

Hello, my name is Pavena Srelaphan, I am a freelance illustrator from Thailand Bangkok, I use name maomee_sammy on social media such as instagram and facebook. During the past several years, I create artwork for Thai publishing and local business companies.

I primarily create art with pigment ink pen in style of line, dot and shadow. Sometimes, I also use watercolor or Photoshop to illustrate the drawing in colors. Natural plants, wild animals and patterns are the objects very often I like to use in my drawings, I also focus on details of the little critters. When I am drawing, I have passion for showing my feeling and thinking in a beatiful way.
 
Over years, my passion and learning make me grow up. Now, I would like to take this chance to present my first art book "A Journey in Drawing of Nature and Creatures". In this book, it includes drawings from my own, most of them are in black and white pen drawing style, only fews are in colors that I did with Photoshop. I want people to know my book, my art and even my mind, your admiration is my passion to go on in further.

I would like to say thank you so much for your support to make this book come true. If you have any suggestion or question, or be willing to know me, you can contact me by email "maomaewmee@gmail.com", or my instagram "@maomee_sammy", I would be very happy and willing to answer back to you.

(I and my cat "maomee")

 

 

MY FIRST ART BOOK

This is my first art book, a collection of 70 drawings from my last several years. It has 120 pages, hard covered, A5 size (148mm x 210 mm), high quality print. By now, this book is ready to print.

I design the whole book by myself, including very few writings for the preface and epilogue. I try my best to make this book as few mistakes as possible, but I know it is really difficult, especially the english language. 

Example book photos:

 

 

 

WHAT I WILL OFFER

Together with the book, there are some goodies like postcard, art print, quantity limited original art works and commissions I can offer for you.

 

 

 

 

List of Perks

You can choose from the perks listed below. For the original artworks, there are only 10 available. You can also choose commissions if you have idea to design a brand new work.

 

INITIAL FUNDING GOAL

My initial goal is 6,000USD for the print from the Thai local print store in order to get a lower price but in high quality.  The expense mainly covers book print, accessories, artwork making, few percents of the fund will go to Indiegogo, money transfer cost and tax. Please be noted that the delivery cost is not included in the fund, I will use Thai post office to deliver the product to all of you by default, if you would like to change, please let me know.

 

STRETCH GOALS

The funding duration is 45 days, I really hope something miracle will happen. If I can reach (pls. be noted all below stretch goals will be only for the backer over 25USD ):

8,000 USD - you will get 1 set 3 pieces of bookmark new designed for free

10,000 USD - you will get 1 piece postcard new designed for free

15,000 USD - you will get 1 piece A5 print new designed for free

20,000 USD - I will add extra 8 pieces of new drawings to the book.

40,000 USD - I will add extra 8 pieces of new drawings to the book.

... ...

If you have any idea of the stretch goal, please feel free to let me know. 

 

YOUR IMPACT

To be a freelance artist is always a big challenge to me. I hold on several years and I believe I can create more amazing artworks. 

To be a freelance artist also needs support from people like you, no matter you support with money or support on social media, it always means a lot to me. I will be more confident to believe what I am doing is right for our world.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Although I try my best to control the quality of the whole process, I still need to mention some risks below:

1) the production time may delay because of many queues, I will try best to negotiate with the store earlier and fix the date  for print as soon as I get the fund.

2) the delivery time and possible damage of the product. I try best to pack all the products well, but there is still something I can't control during the delivery. Please kindly be patient and understand, if you receive a damaged product, I will try my best to change for you. I will also confirm the delivery info with you again after funding is over.

3) Once I reach the stretch goal for adding extra new drawings, the delivery time may delay one month, but I will try best to finish all extra drawings as soon as possible so that you can get the book on time.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Any kind of help is appreciated, you can help me sharing this page and follow me on my social media pages:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/maomee_sammy/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRHnylmb4Gnxpa...
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/maomee_sammy
story_txt:
ABOUT ME
Hello, my name is Pavena Srelaphan, I am a freelance illustrator from Thailand Bangkok, I use name maomee_sammy on social media such as instagram and facebook. During the past several years, I create artwork for Thai publishing and local business companies.I primarily create art with pigment ink pen in style of line, dot and shadow. Sometimes, I also use watercolor or Photoshop to illustrate the drawing in colors. Natural plants, wild animals and patterns are the objects very often I like to use in my drawings, I also focus on details of the little critters. When I am drawing, I have passion for showing my feeling and thinking in a beatiful way. Over years, my passion and learning make me grow up. Now, I would like to take this chance to present my first art book "A Journey in Drawing of Nature and Creatures". In this book, it includes drawings from my own, most of them are in black and white pen drawing style, only fews are in colors that I did with Photoshop. I want people to know my book, my art and even my mind, your admiration is my passion to go on in further.I would like to say thank you so much for your support to make this book come true. If you have any suggestion or question, or be willing to know me, you can contact me by email "maomaewmee@gmail.com", or my instagram "@maomee_sammy", I would be very happy and willing to answer back to you.

(I and my cat "maomee")
 
 

MY FIRST ART BOOK
This is my first art book, a collection of 70 drawings from my last several years. It has 120 pages, hard covered, A5 size (148mm x 210 mm), high quality print. By now, this book is ready to print.
I design the whole book by myself, including very few writings for the preface and epilogue. I try my best to make this book as few mistakes as possible, but I know it is really difficult, especially the english language. 
Example book photos:









 
 
 
WHAT I WILL OFFER
Together with the book, there are some goodies like postcard, art print, quantity limited original art works and commissions I can offer for you.




 
 
 
 
List of Perks
You can choose from the perks listed below. For the original artworks, there are only 10 available. You can also choose commissions if you have idea to design a brand new work.



 
INITIAL FUNDING GOAL
My initial goal is 6,000USD for the print from the Thai local print store in order to get a lower price but in high quality.  The expense mainly covers book print, accessories, artwork making, few percents of the fund will go to Indiegogo, money transfer cost and tax. Please be noted that the delivery cost is not included in the fund, I will use Thai post office to deliver the product to all of you by default, if you would like to change, please let me know.

 
STRETCH GOALS
The funding duration is 45 days, I really hope something miracle will happen. If I can reach (pls. be noted all below stretch goals will be only for the backer over 25USD ):
8,000 USD - you will get 1 set 3 pieces of bookmark new designed for free
10,000 USD - you will get 1 piece postcard new designed for free
15,000 USD - you will get 1 piece A5 print new designed for free
20,000 USD - I will add extra 8 pieces of new drawings to the book.
40,000 USD - I will add extra 8 pieces of new drawings to the book.
... ...
If you have any idea of the stretch goal, please feel free to let me know. 

 

YOUR IMPACT
To be a freelance artist is always a big challenge to me. I hold on several years and I believe I can create more amazing artworks. 
To be a freelance artist also needs support from people like you, no matter you support with money or support on social media, it always means a lot to me. I will be more confident to believe what I am doing is right for our world.
 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES
Although I try my best to control the quality of the whole process, I still need to mention some risks below:
1) the production time may delay because of many queues, I will try best to negotiate with the store earlier and fix the date  for print as soon as I get the fund.
2) the delivery time and possible damage of the product. I try best to pack all the products well, but there is still something I can't control during the delivery. Please kindly be patient and understand, if you receive a damaged product, I will try my best to change for you. I will also confirm the delivery info with you again after funding is over.
3) Once I reach the stretch goal for adding extra new drawings, the delivery time may delay one month, but I will try best to finish all extra drawings as soon as possible so that you can get the book on time.
 
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Any kind of help is appreciated, you can help me sharing this page and follow me on my social media pages:
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/maomee_sammy/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRHnylmb4Gnxpa...Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/maomee_sammy

story:
The goal

The aim of the project is to celebrate age and wisdom by creating portraits of women over 50 from around the world. 

In the period of 360 days I will create 36 portraits of inspiring women from different cultures and backgrounds, women from different professions, women that have a lot of experience and have something important to share. 

Every portrait will be accompanied by text telling the story of the woman and her life advice to her younger self and the younger women in general.

By the end of the project a high quality album will be produced including all the portraits and stories.

Why women?

Because women are creators. Because women are life. Because women are inspiring. Because women are brave. Because we need their wisdom. 

The outcome?

The outcome of the project will be:

- 36 portraits of women over 50 

- 36 stories from as many different countries as possible

- Digital and Print/ High quality album with the portraits

- 1 event in Sofia - exhibition of the 36 artworks

- 1 event in Bansko - exhibition of the 36 artworks

Some other details:

- All canvases used will be not smaller than 40/50 cm

- All portraits will be made with oil or acrylic - or mixed technique

- Style of painting may vary from one portrait to another according to artists decision of which is more appropriate for the participant

- All portraits will be scanned or photographed in a professional studio in order to maximize the affect of the artwork

- The album will be both digital and printed.

- If needed photographs of the participating women will be used as reference and all the photographers will be asked for permition to use the images and credited in the digital and hard copy

- Participants will be gathered both online trough a webform and in person

- Participants in the project must sign a letter of consent.

Dates:

15 May- website with full description of the project, video, timelapse recordings of the process of painting, interviews with women etc. 

Why me?

My name is Irina Pandeva and I am an artist from Bulgaria. I am a descendant of The Maler family in Bansko, Bulgaria. My grand grand grand fathers were one of the most recognized icon painters in their time in the Balkans. Die Maler (German for painters) have founded the first Bansko Art School - a cultural phenomenon in the end of the 18th century. Similar to them I paint portraits, because I find the human face fascinating. I think that the face is expressing the soul of a human in a very special way. It shows the paths and the changes in one’s life, it shows the experience and wisdom imprinted in the wrinkles and captured in the eyes.

My mission is to continue the work of my ancestors, by creating art that reflects life.

Do you want to be included in the album?

Great! You have to be over 50 and a woman :) You can buy the portrait package and not only support the project, but recieve your own original portrait. There is a form with question I will ask you to fill, in order to get to know you better and include your story in the album.

Do you want to include somebody else as a gift?

Awesome, they will surely love it. You will recieve a personalized gift voucher that you can give to that special person. Reminder:  they have to be over 50 and female, fill out the form and sign a letter of consent for participating in the project.

story:
During my 15 year long career as a design engineer and projects manager I have had extensive exposure to design and development projects that ranged from small detailed components to entire vehicles and petrochemical testing facilities. One thing that is abundantly clear when I look back at my career is that the greatly successful projects differed from the difficult projects mostly due to one main aspect. The principles and processes around which the design was based and ultimately allowed to evolve.

From an early age I have also had opportunity to register and own patents and learn some good, but hard lessons. Early on in my career I bought books that promised success and gave recipes of how to take ideas from your garage to the top floor of a multi-million dollar company. I bought a lot of these and followed their advice, but those early projects all had two things lacking which the books did not address; how to design a product that will serve a needed purpose and then how to best make use of available funds to take that product to market. 

Most of the books I have read concentrate on the more commercial side of the business; patenting, license agreements, venture capital and the like, but the problem with that is that if you design a product that has little purpose to the market or does not fulfill its purpose due to poor quality, poor design, difficulty in use, function or manufacture, etc, then no amount of advice on the rest of the commercial processes is going to help you fulfill your ultimate goal of bringing a product into this world that will be accepted and used by mainstream society. In other words, all of the books lacked the same thing. They lacked the teaching of the necessary processes and thinking that is required to set a good foundation for a product; that being that the product is fit for purpose. 

This book takes an in depth look at the world of the engineer and takes you through the necessary design processes required when designing a product. The processes necessary to capture the requirements that your product must embody in order to fulfill the need or function for which it effectively is being created and therefore effectively becomes needed by society. Whilst this book will not give you a masters degree in advanced math or structural design, it will give you the skills necessary to take a product from the faint beginnings of an idea to a solid manufacturable concept and detailed design that will be necessary for you to then approach industry for prototypes, venture capital, production and all other aspects of business. It will explain the goals you will need to achieve along each part of the process so that you ensure you remain focused on solving the problems for which the product was originally intended as well as put you in a position whereby you will be taken seriously by prototype and final production manufacturers, venture capitalists, patent attorneys and all others in the world you are going to meet along the path of bringing your creation to life.


In a nutshell, this is an "engineering" book for the everyday man and woman and one that may just be the difference to your product being a success or not.

story:
Hello and Welcome to our campaign page!

 

 

Who we are:

We are a married creative couple who both received our Arts degrees from the Arts and Culture College of Pskov, (where we met!), in 2008. But I graduated from the Faculty of Decorative and Applied Art, and my husband - the Faculty of Directing Theatrical Performances.

Since graduation, we gave birth to our beautiful son (photo with deer), and moved to the countryside, where we live now. I am fond of creating traditional Slavic folk dolls and teaching others about it, and my husband (he chose another craft!) invents amazing wood interior items.

Over the past year and a half, we have received a lot of e-mails from people who would like to learn how to make folk dolls and to prepare medicinal herbs properly. All these people were ready to come to us right now and attend several master classes, and just to stay here for a while.

There are very beautiful places (our river):

Pushkin Museum:

But we had to refuse them.. And we still refuse, because now they have nowhere to come. We have neither a comfortable workshop, nor a room for master classes, nor a just small house where we could accommodate guests. But we want these people to come to us so much!

And here's what we came up with:

 

What we are doing:

Our campaign is to raise money to create a place in which everyone will get the opportunity to learn and practice art. With the money we raise, we will be able to build and organize universal living space that will combine the hostel, family workshop and camping at the same time! 

This is an image of how it will look like, approximately:

This is an image of how it looks now:

With your help, we will  build a place, that will bring together many good and interesting people. Artists, craftsmen, travelers, photographers, writers and many others - each of them will be able to come here and to have a great time, sharing their priceless experience with each other!

 

What we need:

$21,400

Our total financial goal is $21,400. This money will be used for the construction of two small 6 * 6 meters houses, water supply systems, heating, electrification, arrangement of a workshop, camping grounds, planting fruit trees and shrubs, and other things that are minimally necessary for a comfortable stay, creativity and training.

 

How we will use the campaign money to build out the basics!

(We don't want to waste your money, so my husband will do all the construction work on his own. He already has a similar experience, and I fully trust him in that work).

Concrete foundation - $403

It will be reinforced concrete pillars, deepened into the ground. We will use a lot of stones to reduce the amount of cement needed.

Wood for houses' frames construction - $2020

This includes the purchase of wood for the construction of frames of two houses and the installation of rough floors. And the cost of delivery of materials to the construction site.​

Interior and exterior finish - $3324

Purchase and delivery of lining (for finishing interior walls and the ceilings) and boards for making the finishing floors. 

Insulation - $1832

The project is designed to invite guests not only in the summer, so it is expected to use a two-layer insulation mats of rock wool with thickness of 100mm.​ 

Roofing - $986

As a roofing material, we will use Ondulin. It is lightweight, and easy to install. However, if we can't raise enough money, we'll cover the roof with roll material. For example, roofing felt.

Heating - $1120

The volume of each house is about 108 cubic meters. Therefore, it will be enough to install one  heater in each house.​ Flue parts included.

Arranging a water supply system - $3170

It is necessary to dig two wells to provide people with clean natural water. Install pumping stations, boilers and install the entire pipeline.​

Electrification - $1038

This involves the purchase of all cables, sockets and switches necessary to provide homes with electricity. And laying the power cable underground.​

Doors and Windows - $2338

We want more daylight in our homes. Therefore, in each house we need to install eight windows. Four of which will be installed in the roofs. My husband will make all the doors by himself.​

Wood Terrace - $547

To one of the houses we need to attach a large terrace. It is necessary for conducting master classes in the fresh air in the warm season. The terrace will be made of two parts 3 * 6 meters and 3*9 meters.

Sanitary engineering - $1412

Purchase, delivery and installation of shower, sinks, bio-toilets.

Camping Sites - $442

Three simple wooden platforms 3*6 meters on which about 18 people with convenience will be able to take place.

Minimum necessary furniture - $984

Such as primitive beds, chairs, tables, cabinets and bedside tables. In general, the most necessary furniture. In order to save money, my husband will do it himself.

Workshop for doll making - $292

In one of the houses, in the attic floor, we plan to equip a workshop to create dolls. There should be a large table, good lighting, and plenty of shelves for fabrics, threads and other accessories.

Workshop for woodworking - $1492

If we raise this money, we'd build a small workshop for woodworking. This amount would be enough for the foundation, frame, simple insulation and primitive finish. And then my husband would have a more comfortable space to create his wonderful works!

 

Perks:

What YOU get!

If you donate:

 

$10

Everyone who gives at least $10 will receive a  handwritten thank you card with an image of local beautiful landscapes and places.

 

$25

1 completely eco-friendly handcrafted beeswax candle 3.2'(height) * 2'(dia) - 50 available

 

$50

Your choice:  1. Traditional slavic Folk doll-amulet 'Joy' (helps to stay in good mood, recommended to wear around neck) - 20 available / 2. Folk doll-amulet, protecting everyone who is on the road (traveler or driver, can be hung on the rearview mirror in the car) - 20 available / 3.  Folk doll-amulet 'For Happiness', helps to create and to keep happiness in your house - 20 available

 

$100

           Your choice:  1. Handcrafted charred wood tealight holder 3,6'' * 4,4''  - 20 available / 2. Set of 3 beeswax candles - 20 available / 3. Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family (different colors) - 20 available

 

$150

 Your choice:  1. Charred wood decorative bowl 5.6" * 12" + Folk doll-amulet 'For Happiness', helps to create and to keep happiness in your house - 10 available / 2. Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family (different colors) + Set of 3 beeswax candles - 15 available / 3. Shabby white tealight holder with legs 3.6" * 4.8" + Folk doll-amulet, protecting everyone who is on the road (traveler or driver, can be hung on the rearview mirror in the car)- 10 available

 

$300

Your choice: 1. Set: 3 round charred wood bowls 5.6" dia + Traditional slavic Folk doll-amulet 'Joy' (helps to stay in good mood, recommended to wear around neck) - 10 available / 2. Set: 1 charred wood bowl 5.6" * 12" + 1 brown-black Tealight holder with legs + Folk doll-amulet, protecting everyone who is on the road (traveler or driver, can be hung on the rearview mirror in the car) - 10 available

 

$500

Everyone who gives us $500 can choose one of these sets: 1. Three charred wood brown-black or shabby white tealight holders, height 4", 6", 8" +  Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family or individual (different colors) + 3 eco-friendly beeswax candles - 5 available / 2.  Five round charred wood bowls 5.6" dia + Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family (different colors) + 3 eco-friendly beeswax candles - 5 available

 

What If we Don't make our Goal?

 

If we don't make our entire goal we we'll start the construction anyway. We'll do what we can. Of course, it will be much slower. It may take a few years, but we can't give up our idea!

You will still receive your awesome perks, and we will still be able to have this incredible experience, but things will be a lot tighter.

We really do believe that this campaign is totally achievable. With your help we can make this dream a reality!

 

Impact & Mission Statement

Why is this project important to us? Why will it be important to you?

Here are 6 good reasons to donate to this campaign:

 

1. You get a chance to participate in an interesting social project!

The area we live in is about 1059 square kilometers. And there is no cheap hostel or camping! In other words, a tired traveler is not able to relax without overpaying for the convenience that he will not use. 

Thanks to you, we will create a place where everyone can choose for himself. He can sleep in a tent or a house. Cook food on the fire or on the stove. 

Helping us, you help every traveler, every person who wants just to take a shower, drink a cup of hot tea and have a good sleep!

2. You are a unique and direct participant in the cultural development of society! You help others to acquire new knowledge and skills!

 Because we can teach everyone:

  • how to make traditional slavic folk dolls (to attach people to the ancient culture of our ancestors. In our area there are almost no such places) 
  • how to gather and dry herbs right
  • how to process and decorate the wood 
  • how to weave herbal tapestries or textile tapestries 
  • how to sew in the technique of patchwork, and much much more!

3. You get a chance to support the artisans so they can continue to create their incredible works in a much more comfortable environment! A separate workshop, a separate place for master classes - ain't it a dream!

4. You get to tell all your friends that you are an arts supporting philanthropist (High-fives all around!)

5. You will get cool stuff! (Who doesn’t love that?)

6. You will have our undying gratitude!

The success of this campaign will help to realize our longstanding dream - every day to change our lives and the lives of others for the better! By close friendly communication, exchange of experience and joint creativity!

 

Risks & Challenges

We are not afraid of any risks or challenges associated with the planning and construction of our space. Fortunately, my husband Igor has a good experience of such work. I can totally rely on him. We know that difficulties are inevitable, but we can do anything!

If the campaign is successful, we will be able to invite everyone on December 1, 2019. Maybe even earlier.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 1. If you can't contribute, but want to help somehow, please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  You know people that we don’t! Tell them all about this campaign and what an exciting thing it is we are doing!

2. Use the Indiegogo share tools to post about us all over the internets and social media so more folks can find out about us and help us out!

 

Other Way You Can Donate

You can donate via PayPal, if you don't want to do it using Indiegogo, by any reasons. Just, send us a screenshot of your donation transaction and attach full description of the perk, you want to get. Our PayPal account is: mennastja@mail.ru

 

And that's all, folks! Please let us know if you have any other questions or comments.

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

And that's all there is to it.

It will be reinforced concrete pillars, deepened into the ground. We will use a lot of stones to reduce the amount of cement needed.
Wood for houses' frames construction - $2020
This includes the purchase of wood for the construction of frames of two houses and the installation of rough floors. And the cost of delivery of materials to the construction site.​
Interior and exterior finish - $3324
Purchase and delivery of lining (for finishing interior walls and the ceilings) and boards for making the finishing floors. 
Insulation - $1832
The project is designed to invite guests not only in the summer, so it is expected to use a two-layer insulation mats of rock wool with thickness of 100mm.​ 
Roofing - $986
As a roofing material, we will use Ondulin. It is lightweight, and easy to install. However, if we can't raise enough money, we'll cover the roof with roll material. For example, roofing felt.
Heating - $1120
The volume of each house is about 108 cubic meters. Therefore, it will be enough to install one  heater in each house.​ Flue parts included.
Arranging a water supply system - $3170
It is necessary to dig two wells to provide people with clean natural water. Install pumping stations, boilers and install the entire pipeline.​
Electrification - $1038
This involves the purchase of all cables, sockets and switches necessary to provide homes with electricity. And laying the power cable underground.​
Doors and Windows - $2338
We want more daylight in our homes. Therefore, in each house we need to install eight windows. Four of which will be installed in the roofs. My husband will make all the doors by himself.​
Wood Terrace - $547
To one of the houses we need to attach a large terrace. It is necessary for conducting master classes in the fresh air in the warm season. The terrace will be made of two parts 3 * 6 meters and 3*9 meters.
Sanitary engineering - $1412
Purchase, delivery and installation of shower, sinks, bio-toilets.
Camping Sites - $442
Three simple wooden platforms 3*6 meters on which about 18 people with convenience will be able to take place.
Minimum necessary furniture - $984
Such as primitive beds, chairs, tables, cabinets and bedside tables. In general, the most necessary furniture. In order to save money, my husband will do it himself.
Workshop for doll making - $292
In one of the houses, in the attic floor, we plan to equip a workshop to create dolls. There should be a large table, good lighting, and plenty of shelves for fabrics, threads and other accessories.
Workshop for woodworking - $1492
If we raise this money, we'd build a small workshop for woodworking. This amount would be enough for the foundation, frame, simple insulation and primitive finish. And then my husband would have a more comfortable space to create his wonderful works!
 
Perks:
What YOU get!
If you donate:
 
$10
Everyone who gives at least $10 will receive a  handwritten thank you card with an image of local beautiful landscapes and places.
 
$25

1 completely eco-friendly handcrafted beeswax candle 3.2'(height) * 2'(dia) - 50 available
 
$50

Your choice:  1. Traditional slavic Folk doll-amulet 'Joy' (helps to stay in good mood, recommended to wear around neck) - 20 available / 2. Folk doll-amulet, protecting everyone who is on the road (traveler or driver, can be hung on the rearview mirror in the car) - 20 available / 3.  Folk doll-amulet 'For Happiness', helps to create and to keep happiness in your house - 20 available
 
$100
           Your choice:  1. Handcrafted charred wood tealight holder 3,6'' * 4,4''  - 20 available / 2. Set of 3 beeswax candles - 20 available / 3. Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family (different colors) - 20 available
 
$150

 Your choice:  1. Charred wood decorative bowl 5.6" * 12" + Folk doll-amulet 'For Happiness', helps to create and to keep happiness in your house - 10 available / 2. Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family (different colors) + Set of 3 beeswax candles - 15 available / 3. Shabby white tealight holder with legs 3.6" * 4.8" + Folk doll-amulet, protecting everyone who is on the road (traveler or driver, can be hung on the rearview mirror in the car)- 10 available
 
$300
Your choice: 1. Set: 3 round charred wood bowls 5.6" dia + Traditional slavic Folk doll-amulet 'Joy' (helps to stay in good mood, recommended to wear around neck) - 10 available / 2. Set: 1 charred wood bowl 5.6" * 12" + 1 brown-black Tealight holder with legs + Folk doll-amulet, protecting everyone who is on the road (traveler or driver, can be hung on the rearview mirror in the car) - 10 available
 
$500

Everyone who gives us $500 can choose one of these sets: 1. Three charred wood brown-black or shabby white tealight holders, height 4", 6", 8" +  Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family or individual (different colors) + 3 eco-friendly beeswax candles - 5 available / 2.  Five round charred wood bowls 5.6" dia + Traditional slavic folk doll-amulet, helps to increase well-being and prosperity in the family (different colors) + 3 eco-friendly beeswax candles - 5 available
 
What If we Don't make our Goal?
 
If we don't make our entire goal we we'll start the construction anyway. We'll do what we can. Of course, it will be much slower. It may take a few years, but we can't give up our idea!
You will still receive your awesome perks, and we will still be able to have this incredible experience, but things will be a lot tighter.
We really do believe that this campaign is totally achievable. With your help we can make this dream a reality!
 
Impact & Mission Statement
Why is this project important to us? Why will it be important to you?

Here are 6 good reasons to donate to this campaign:
 
1. You get a chance to participate in an interesting social project!
The area we live in is about 1059 square kilometers. And there is no cheap hostel or camping! In other words, a tired traveler is not able to relax without overpaying for the convenience that he will not use. 
Thanks to you, we will create a place where everyone can choose for himself. He can sleep in a tent or a house. Cook food on the fire or on the stove. 
Helping us, you help every traveler, every person who wants just to take a shower, drink a cup of hot tea and have a good sleep!
2. You are a unique and direct participant in the cultural development of society! You help others to acquire new knowledge and skills!
 Because we can teach everyone:

how to make traditional slavic folk dolls (to attach people to the ancient culture of our ancestors. In our area there are almost no such places) 
how to gather and dry herbs right
how to process and decorate the wood 
how to weave herbal tapestries or textile tapestries 
how to sew in the technique of patchwork, and much much more!

3. You get a chance to support the artisans so they can continue to create their incredible works in a much more comfortable environment! A separate workshop, a separate place for master classes - ain't it a dream!
4. You get to tell all your friends that you are an arts supporting philanthropist (High-fives all around!)
5. You will get cool stuff! (Who doesn’t love that?)
6. You will have our undying gratitude!

The success of this campaign will help to realize our longstanding dream - every day to change our lives and the lives of others for the better! By close friendly communication, exchange of experience and joint creativity!
 

Risks & Challenges
We are not afraid of any risks or challenges associated with the planning and construction of our space. Fortunately, my husband Igor has a good experience of such work. I can totally rely on him. We know that difficulties are inevitable, but we can do anything!
If the campaign is successful, we will be able to invite everyone on December 1, 2019. Maybe even earlier.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
 1. If you can't contribute, but want to help somehow, please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  You know people that we don’t! Tell them all about this campaign and what an exciting thing it is we are doing!
2. Use the Indiegogo share tools to post about us all over the internets and social media so more folks can find out about us and help us out!
 
Other Way You Can Donate
You can donate via PayPal, if you don't want to do it using Indiegogo, by any reasons. Just, send us a screenshot of your donation transaction and attach full description of the perk, you want to get. Our PayPal account is: mennastja@mail.ru
 
And that's all, folks! Please let us know if you have any other questions or comments.
Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ
And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

My names is Alan James.

 About Me:

First of all, I am an extremely driven and passionate artist!

"I create at least one painting a day"!

That said, I am an award winning watercolor artist and longtime resident of New England.

I am an art instructor at the historic Lyme Art Association in Old Lyme, CT , Art supply store Jerry's Artarama in West Hartford, CT. and at my studio in Deep River, CT.

Recently, I have teamed up with the global art educational TV show called "Put Some Colour In your Life"  to film a TV episode of me putting together a live painting demonstration. 

Here's a CIYL episode featuring world reknowned artist Joseph Zbukvic.

CIYL is an Australian television series that is a privately and publicly funded non-profit membership media organization based in Murwillumbah, just south of the NSW/QLD border.

My show will be distributed to over 300 TV stations in over 13 Countries throughout the world as well as many internet platforms such as YouTube, Vimeo and the like. 
And now, I would like to invite you to join us in this effort that will not only be a gigantic career booster for me, but will at the same time, bring art instruction and awareness to millions and millions of people, around the world, through this really, really cool TV show!

Insight: Just like our National Public Radio (NPR), here in the States, this program (CIYL) relies solely on the generous contributions from people just like you and me, to make it happen.

Testimonials

John Hulsey  Season 18 Episode 12

'Wow! Fabulous job with my show. Best production/interview I have ever had! Five stars. You guys are real pros and I can’t say enough good things about Sophia Stacey. Take it from me - of all the professional video interviews I have had the good fortune to be a part of, this is the top, hands down. Well worth the small investment for an outstanding result like this. Love from Ann, also. You are welcome back here anytime!'

Watch John's show

Here's a link to many more testimonials: https://www.colourinyourlife.com.au/testimonials/

Check out the stations that carry this show at the following link: https://www.colourinyourlife.com.au/networks/

Can you imagine the positive impact of promoting the arts to people from all over the world indefinitely would mean for art awareness?

You can check out my art work at:  https://alanjamesart.com/

...and here are a couple of links to the CIYL TV show :

 https://www.colourinyourlife.com.au/

 https://www.youtube.com/user/MazumaProductions1

We are close to reaching our goal with just $6600.00 remaning to cover the rest of the production costs and would like you to join our team to see this through to fruition.

In appreciation for your generous contributions,  I am offering select original paintings, prints, and dvd's to contributors, listed here and at the end of the enclosed video!

No Risk Investment

This is a fixed fund raiser, which means, if for some reason we do not reach our financial goal, all contributions are set to automatically go back into your bank account within 5 to 7 business days.

That said, I have a good feeling about this campaign and am confident that we will reach our goal in no time!

Note: Please don't worry if you are unable to give a contribution at this time, you can still help by sharing this campaign on social media, word of mouth and the share tools provided here on Indiegogo. 

Thank you so much for your support, Alan

Important notice: In the film I mention our funding goal at $5000, however, since putting the video together, I re-crunched the numbers and came up with the new figure of $6600.

I hope this clarifies things a bit.

Perks: Don't forget to check out the cool perks you will receive for you generous contributions!

story:
And The Force Will Rock (Everybody Wants Han)

I've had this weird idea in my head forever. I kinda forgot about it when the last round of Star Wars flix sucked as badly as Van Hagerone did, but now Han's back, and so is Dave, and so is this idea, because fucking awesome.

What You Get

  • FULL color. Old-school iron-on look with new-school quality and comfort.
  • Full range of Youth, Women's And Men's sizes available.
  • Lotsa shirt color choices. 
  • Short campaign for light-speed delivery.

The Impact

This shirt will make the world better, because Han Fucking Valen.

Risks & Challenges

I've been making shirts and all sorts of ideas real for forever. We got this.

Ways You Can Help

If you don't feel like gettin in on this but you know someone that might, pass it on!

Here's to makin all our weird ideas real.

story:
My artist name is Serena Toxicat and I'm a writer, purrformer, and multi-disciplinary crazy cat artist in Oakland, CA. I am owned by a wonderful chausie cat named Selket, volunteer with the wild kitties at Isis Oasis ocelot sanctuary, run a Bast Goddess temple, and have sung in sacred spaces around the world, including the King's Chamber of Khufu, Egypt's Great Pyramid.

All illustrations (Major "Arcata" and the 4 Suits) are finished now, and the insert and box artwork are almost complete. 

I have proofed the images through a company that just manufactures cards and so far my cost-per-box is higher than the retail price of many decks on the market. Once I can afford to order in bulk, the price will go down.

What needs to be done: Framing the cards for uniformity (maybe), proofing them a few more times, then printing them in volume so I can get the bulk discount. Working on the release event, which will involve a venue, promo, bands and catering.

Risks and challenges

I have successfully self-published books and music, so I know this can be done; it's just expensive to do. 
Making cards is a lot like producing CD digipaks. Speaking of which, I will be offering these (books and/or CDs) as rewards. 

books - www.amazon.com/author/serenatoxicat

CDs - https://www.cdbaby.com/Artist/Protea

Thank mew for helping me get this crazy-cat lady (of any gender) deck 'catifested' in the world!   Love, light, and pussycats,

Serena (and Selket)

story:
About us 

Our fundraising campaign is being led by three individuals: Koby, Georgia and Tom. 

Koby is a hardworking and passionate illustrator, and he works primarily within textiles, toy making, print work and character illustrations. 

Georgia is a dedicated and ambitious illustrator. Her work usually demonstrates character design, concept illustration, visual development or graphics for products. 

Tom is heavily inspired by our shared histories and cultures, working primarily within children's illustration to encourage engagement with historical content. His work is gestural and figurative. 

The rest of our team demonstrate an even broader selection of skills and talents, displaying a variety of unique approaches to the concept of illustration, and include:

  • Amy 
  • Anna
  • Bethia 
  • Dani
  • Danielle
  • Dehanka
  • Else
  • Emma
  • George
  • John
  • Joe
  • Leah
  • Monique
  • Octavia
  • Paishe
  • Ross
  • Sammy
  • Sarah
  • Will
  • Wyman

As students, we feel that New Designers is essential to developing good relations with our industry, and a vital opportunity to begin our careers.

We desperately want to be able to attend, and to do so at the best of our ability to impress future clients, and develop strong networking connections that will follow us for the rest of our lives.

And we need your help.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to continue manually fundraising, so we are hoping to raise half our total remaining goal via this platform - £600. 100% of money funded will go towards helping prepare the event to be the absolute best it can be!

To give something back, if you donate £25 or more, you get a 'Lucky Dip' print! Each print will be hand prepared by one of our talented illustrators, and sent to you as a thank you for your support.

Even if we don't reach our goal, all of the funds will go to supporting the event, which we will still try our best to attend no matter the outcome.

The Impact

We have endeavoured to use this as an opportunity to aid the community, working closely with local businesses, such as the One Eyed Dog and the Round Tower, hosting markets and other artistic events to help encourage footfall. 

Our exhibition is extremely valuable in helping to promote Portsmouth university and encouraging more people to attend our university!

Risks & Challenges

We are aware that we face many challenges during this campaign, however we believe that with our dedicated team, we can over come any hurdle we may encounter!

Other Ways You Can Help

We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for reading this far! If you want to support our project (Thank you!) but cannot afford to donate, please consider sharing this page around, we would really appreciate your help in achieving our goals.

Many thanks,

Georgia, Koby and Tom

story:
Hello there my name is LucciolaCrown, aka Chelsea Rose, a concept artist for Yandere Simulator. What this campaign is all about is giving me the ability to produce some yansim charms for the community to purchase and enjoy.

------------------------

So what this campaign is here for is to cover costs of production of all of these charms and the shipping fees! From funding the project you will be able to help in the creation of these cute charms. There will be an exclusive perk upon donating $55 you will get an entire set of all the 12 charms[This will not be up on the shop and charms will be $6.00 each]

After the goals are met any extra money will go to the top 3-5 charms sold so I will buy another batch[50 each]!

So if you wish to see more of a certain character leave your vote below
Vote Here

This includes the main 12:

  • Ayano Aishi [Yan + Dere versions] - Protagonist
  • Osana Najimi - Childhood Friend
  • Amai Odayaka - Cooking Club Leader
  •  Kizana Sunobu - Drama Club Leader
  • Oka Ruto - Occult Club Leader
  • Azu Rito - Sports Club Leader
  • Muja Kina - School Nurse
  • Mida Rana - Substitute Teacher
  • Osoro Shidesu - Delinquent Leader
  • Hanako Yamada - Sister
  • Megami Saiko - Student Council President]

Hitting our full goal will also unlock 4 more characters that will go up for straight sale once produced.

These 4 extra characters are:

  • Taro Yamada - Senpai
  • Musume Ronshaku - Loan Shark's Daughter
  • Midori Gurin - Cute Green Question Expert
  • Mr.Jazzyfeet - The Turtle

With this project being produced you and your friends will be able to grab a small physical charm that shows off your favorite character! You could even gather your money together to split a 12 set if you wished!

If you still want to help out but can't afford to donate to the cause feel free to reblog and share!

If some how the highest tier is doubled that will cover the production costs again so I will buy an extra 50 charms of each character to be sold!

story:
Hi, I’m Georgina, owner of Swiftterly! I have successfully launched and funded my Viking themed enamel pins on Kickstarter but I would like to make it available for the next week or two whilst my kickstarter funds are being sent, just in case anyone missed out!

I am a huge viking and animal lover and these pins express this! All pins for this project will have a black and a white version to choose from.

I have also included a special add on offer where you can add my up and coming Glitterphant enamel pin onto your pledge! More information on that below! 

 

Find me online!

story:
La cultura maya se caracteriza por su profundo conocimiento de los ciclos cósmicos, de los fenómenos naturales y de la relación entre ambos. El calendario maya refleja esta cosmovisión, al presentar una visión sincronizada de los ciclos del universo y de los fenómenos naturales de la Tierra.

The Maya culture is renowned for its profound knowledge of cosmic cycles, natural phenomena and the links between the two. The Mayan calendar reflects this cosmovision and presents a synchronized view of the cycles of the universe and of nature on earth.

Si bien mucho del conocimiento adquirido por los pueblos mesoamericanos se perdió al momento de la conquista española —provocando una debacle cultural, poblacional y económica—, parte del conocimiento alrededor del calendario maya se ha conservado hasta nuestros días.

Despite the fact that a large proportion of the knowledge acquired by the mesoamerican peoples was lost as a result of the Spanish conquest - bringing about a cultural and economical debacle - some of the knowledge about the Mayan calendar has been conserved.

Me llamo Oscar Erik Troncoso Tórrez, mexicano-boliviano, antropólogo de formación y especialista en desarrollo sustentable. He dedicado los últimos 25 años a trabajar en comunidades indígenas del sureste mexicano. Todo este tiempo he vivido en las regiones indígenas y aprendido mucho del conocimiento y de la cultura de los pueblos, por lo cual estoy profundamente agradecido.

My name is Oscar Erik Troncoso Tórrez, Mexican and Bolivian national, bachelor in anthropology and specialist in sustainable development. I have spent the last 25 years working in indigenous communities in Southeast Mexico. I am very grateful to have lived in these indigenous regions and to have taken in much of the knowledge and culture of Maya peoples.

Estos años de convivencia en comunidades indígenas mayas me han dado un acceso privilegiado para aprender el calendario maya, no sólo desde las fuentes históricas, sino a través de las muchas pláticas que he tenido con abuelos (como cariñosamente llamamos a los adultos mayores) de diferentes comunidades y etnias mayas.

The time spent alongside the indigenous Mayans has given me privileged access to knowledge about the Mayan calendar, not only from historical sources but also from conversations I’ve had with the ‘grandpas’ (what we call the elders) of different Maya groups. 

Desde un inicio lo que me sorprendió del calendario maya fue, por un lado, la matemática precisa y, por el otro, el profundo conocimiento de la naturaleza que conlleva, tanto sobre los fenómenos astronómicos como sobre los fenómenos de la naturaleza en la Tierra.

From early on, the mathematical precision and thorough understanding of nature embedded in the calendar caught me by surprise.

Después de todos estos años logré hacer una síntesis que nos ayudará a retomar el calendario maya, entenderlo y usarlo, adaptándolo a nuestra realidad. 

After all these years I have been able to synthesize this knowledge to help us reclaim the Mayan calendar, understand it and adapt it to be used in the modern world.

Este diseño retoma el saber maya guardado en la memoria colectiva de los pueblos, así como en las fuentes históricas y arqueológicas. Se disfruta al observar sus elementos, sincronías y secretos. Pero lo más importante es que, al usarlo día con día, aprenderemos muchas cosas nuevas acerca de la naturaleza de los fenómenos cósmicos. El calendario maya guarda muchas sorpresas para todos nosotros, que se nos irán develando cada día y cada ciclo. Es a través del uso cotidiano del calendario que ganaremos una mayor comprensión de la cosmovisión maya y del significado de los ciclos tal como los entendían los mayas.

This design compiles knowledge kept in the collective memory of the Maya people as well as historical and archeological sources. We can enjoy observing its elements, synchronies and secrets, and most importantly, by using it every day we can learn new things about the nature of cosmic phenomena. The Mayan calendar holds many surprises for us all, which can be revealed with the passage of the days and cycles. By using it in our daily life we can gain a greater understanding of the Maya cosmovision and the meaning of the cycles as they were understood by this fascinating culture.

Este calendario es pues una puerta, una puerta que nos abrirá universos de entendimiento y comprensión de la naturaleza y de la cosmogonía maya. ¡Bienvenidos a la sincronización cósmica y natural del calendario maya!

This calendar is a door. A door that will open to a universe of understanding and comprehension of nature and Mayan cosmogeny. Welcome to the cosmic and natural synchrony of the Mayan calendar!

Campaña promocional

Nuestra meta es lograr apoyo para producir 100 kits o juegos del calendario, y ofrecerlos a USD 250 cada uno, el precio comercial, una vez terminada esta campaña, será de 300 USD mas gastos de envió

Promotional campaign

Our goal is to raise enough resources to make 100 calendar kits and to offer them at $250 each. The comercial price, after this campaign finished, will be 300 USD more shipping cost

Cada kit incluye:

- 1 caja en MDF* pintada y barnizada a mano

- 1 Calendario con 4 ruedas calendáricas móviles en MDF*, pintadas y barnizadas a mano

- 1 manual del uso

- 1 folleto con una explicación general del calendario

 -1 folleto con información detallada para interpretar el significado de los glifos, los ciclos solares y las ruedas calendáricas proféticas.

El precio incluye el envío por correo (MEXPOST) a cualquier lugar del Mundo.

* MDF: madera de "fibra vulcanizada de densidad media" (medium density fiberboard)

El precio comercial, una vez terminada esta campaña, será de USD 300 más gastos de envío.

Each kit will include:

- 1 MDF* box, painted and varnished by hand

- 1 Calendar with 4 MDF mobile calendar wheels, painted and varnished by hand

- 1 Users manual

- 1 Brochure with a general explanation of the calendar

- 1 Brochure containing detailed information to interpret the meaning of the glyphs, the solar cycles and the prophetic calendar wheels.


The price includes shipping (MEXPOST) anywhere in the globe.

*MDF: Medium Density Fiberboard

The retail price after the fundraiser campaign will be $300 plus shipping.


¿Por qué es importante apoyar esta campaña?

· El calendario maya sintetiza el conocimiento astrológico y de la naturaleza de los mayas. Su difusión permitirá conservar este conocimiento e integrar esta cosmovisión del mundo en nuestra vida cotidiana.

· El calendario representa un saber que está siendo olvidado o que sólo queda, fraccionado, en la memoria colectiva de algunos pueblos mayas. Esta campaña permitirá ampliar el acceso de todos a este conocimiento.

· Al adquirir este calendario contribuyes a financiar un proceso de investigación documental que permitirá crear nuevos diseños basados en otros calendarios mesoamericanos, como el azteca y el zapoteca.

Además, ayudas a establecer una línea de producción artesanal, con colaboradores que demuestran su interés en el tema poniendo todo de su parte para mantener un alto nivel de calidad.

· Finalmente, el 30 % de las ganancias netas se destinará a la organización del 1er Encuentro de Sabios del Calendario Maya, con la participación de los “abuelos” de las 32 etnias mayas que aún conservan conocimientos acerca del calendario, a jóvenes y adultos mayas interesados en aprender y conservar el calendario, y a todos los interesados en seguir explorando las distintas interpretaciones de este conocimiento.

Why is it important to support this campaign?

- The Mayan calendar synthesizes the astrological and natural knowledge of the Maya people. Its diffusion will allow us to preserve this knowledge and integrate the Maya cosmovision into our daily life.

- The calendar represents rich knowledge that is being forgotten or remains fragmented only in the collective memory of some Maya peoples. This campaign will allow the world access to this knowledge.

- By contributing to this cause you will help fund research that will allow us to create new designs based on other Mesoamerican calendars, such as the Aztec and the Zapotec calendars.

You will also help to establish an artisanal production line with dedicated collaborators driven to turn their passion for the subject into high quality products.

- Finally, 30% of the net profits will go towards organizing the First Encounter of Elders of the Mayan Calendar, bringing together the ‘grandpas’ of the 32 ethnic groups that still safeguard a knowledge of the calendar. The encounter will also host young people from the Mayan communities and from around the world interested in learning about the calendar, preserving it for the future and exploring the different interpretations of this fascinating knowledge.



Agradezco mucho el interés y el apoyo para la realización de esta campaña

“Tson tsan batel ta pisiltik kermanotak tas baluminal kuuntik”

“Fuerza en su caminar para todos los hermanos de nuestro mundo”


I would like to thank you for your attention and support in realizing this campaign.


“Tson ts´an batel ta pisiltik kermanotak tas baluminal kuuntik”

“Strength in stride for all the brothers of our world”

story:
Contribute today to show your support of LGBTQ and equality for all!

Promote equality while satirically demoting a symbol of bigotry. I'm from the south and understand that many people flying the "Stars and Bars" are just good ol' boys, never meanin' no harm. However, it gets a little confusing to distinguish who's just showing southern pride, and who's a hate mongering bigot, since this symbol has historical connotations of oppression and is often used by hate groups.

So I've found a solution! Show your southern pride without being mistaken as a bigot with one of many colorful bumper stickers or T-shirts. Don't just support the "Stars and Bars" as the flag is often referred to, show your support for Stars and Gay Bars! What better way to take away a symbol's power of hate and oppression than by combining it with a symbol of love and equality? So go ahead, show off your southern gay pride. Whether you're LGBTQ or straight, choose from one of many designs to show your support!

What is the money for?

I will be donating 20% of the net proceeds to a national LGBTQ non-profit organization working for equal rights. Despite the recent legislature, there is still a long way to go. The rest will go towards supporting my own artistic endeavors. While not my regular job, I'm an artist at heart. I would like to continue to pursue my artistic passion, but need resources to do so. Funds raised will help me continue to pay for the things I need to accomplish my creative goals for many other projects.

Seriously...WTF?

The goal of this artistic project is to make people think about how we use symbols in society and how they can affect the feelings of others. I see this as promoting equality while demoting a symbol of bigotry. I expect there will be a variety of reactions and other opinions due to the controversial nature of the topics. Ultimately, this is satire, so try not to take it too seriously.

I have several perks available to those who donate to my campaign. All stickers are durable weatherproof vinyl *not shown to scale* T-shirts are 100% preshrunk cotton. See more FAQs and Risks and Challenges at the bottom of this page.

You get a virtual high five for a $1 donation!

For a $2 donation you get a high resolution download of ALL the designs for personal use. Print as many as you like yourself! Hand them out at rallies! Make some T-shirts!


For a $3 donation get a 4" x 2.5" Stars and Gay Bars flag sticker!



For a $4 donation get a Stars and Gay Bars 7.5" x 3.75" sticker!



For a $5 donation choose any one of the 4" x 4" sticker designs!
(or get all three for $12)







Gay Rebel 11.5" x 3" sticker for a $6 donation!


Southern Gay Pride 11.5" x 3" sticker for a $6 donation!


Get both 11.5" x 3" stickers for a $10 donation!


Get one of each sticker for a $25 donation! That's a total of 7 stickers!


$20 gets you a Southern Gay Pride T-Shirt!



$20 gets you a Gay Rebel T-Shirt!




Risks and Challenges. 

This is my first ever crowd funding campaign, so it's a new experience. The designs are already completed, and I have previous experience working with printing companies, so I don't expect any delays on my end. There is always the possibility of the print company running into delays. I never rule out the chance of a zombie virus outbreak delaying any project I am working on either. 

FAQs

Which charity will a portion of the net proceeds be going to?

To prevent any misconceptions of my fundraising campaign being affiliated with or sponsored by the LGBTQ non-profit organization that will receive the donation of 20% of the net proceeds, I will not mention the name in this campaign unless I have their explicit permission to do so, which at the moment I do not have.

Why shouldn't I just donate directly to a LGBT charity myself?

You should. However, you should also donate to my campaign so you can support my art and get one of my fabulous perks! It's winning for everybody.

What other creative projects are you working on?

At the moment, I hope to create another crowdfunding campaign concerning history and education. As I have found out, to get to the point of trying to raise funds, takes funds. If this project is successfully funded, I will use a portion of the proceeds to help start and promote my next crowdfunding campaign on education.

story:
Soothe the soul with beautiful images

Silvershotz has showcased the portfolios of 140 photographers in the last 18 online magazines.  We have selected the best 15 photographers for this one off book. The Giclée prints and other perks are a one off and ONLY available here.

 Buy for yourself or a Gift and have a Gift Certificate emailed in December - email us with details. 

Why is this book so important?

In the transient virtual world of the internet we still place a value on the permanence of a book and physical prints that can be held and enjoyed in a more intimate way. Silvershotz knows that many of you think the same way which is why we are doing this crowdfunding project, but we cannot do it alone. 

If you are passionate about inspiring portfolios and books  please support us and spread the word  and make some noise about the Silvershotz campaign.Tell your friends and associates, pass the link around your social media sites and  use the Indiegogo share tools!

Fund us, support the photographers, and delight yourself with this breathtaking book. 

Thanking you in advance for your support.

Book Layout

A one page article on each photographer,then nine images as a full plate image on each page.

Perks Available 

 

There is only one available of this silver gelatine print by Tim Rudman. 

‘Aurora Borealis’ Iceland by Tim Rudman. One only one available of a limited edition of 25. A 20x16ins warmtone  fibre-based paper silver gelatine print duo-toned in selenium and thiourea and  handprinted by Tim. Signed, titled and numbered on front, signed, detailed and titled on verso with a certificate of authenticity.

Select one of the following images or you can select all 5 as a ‘12x12ins Giclée print using acid free art paper (uneditioned)

A. Caravan1 by Marie-Laure Vareilles. A 12x12ins Giclée print using acid free art paper (uneditioned)

B. ‘Post Office, Darwin’ by Ed Freeman.  A 12x12ins Giclée print using acid free art paper (uneditioned)

C. ‘Billy Coggins’ by Gary Nichols. A 12x12ins Giclée print using acid free art paper (uneditioned)

D. ‘When reason sleeps’ by Vincent O’Byrne. A 12x12ins Giclée print using acid free art paper (uneditioned)

E. ‘The girl with pearl earring’ by Ludmila Schnaider.  A 12x12ins Giclée print using acid free art paper (uneditioned)

Additional Perks ONLY available on Indiegogo as a one off. 

 Portfolio Review with the editor Clive Waring-Flood. One hour Skype session to discuss your current and future portfolio projects.

Platinum one year subscription to Silvershotz online. View our archives of over 60 magazines plus a new magazine with portfolios, articles , book reviews and video clips every month for 12 months- Only USD$20 ( Normally USD$40) 

​Volume 8 Editions 1 to 6 boxed Collector's set of the last magazine series published. Only 20 available. 

 

Featured Portfolios in the book

The  result is this exceptional assemblage for the book: Marta Azevedo-Brazil, Niki Boon    - New Zealand, Mitch Dobrowner - USA, Rudi Dundas, USA, Ed Freeman – USA, Cheryl Medow -        USA, Beth Moon –USA, Gary Nichols – UK, Vincent O’Byrne – Ireland, Rohan Reilly – Ireland, William Ropp – France, Tim Rudman – UK, Ludmila Schnaider -  Canada, Asher Svidensky      -  Israel, Marie-Laure Vareilles –France.

Silvershotz has finished pre-press production

The designers have finished the layout designs. A sample book with silver foil has been produced. Silvershotz has covered all the initial costs. All we need is the money for the printers; and then we print. 

Silvershotz history

Since 2002 Silvershotz has printed 60 plus collector's magazines and distributed more than half a million to 1400 bookstores in 27 countries.

Printing ceased in 2013 as we made the transition to a multi device, interactive app magazine; and continued the legacy of NO advertising. We have now produced 18 online magazines for in browser app and apps for Android and Apple. 

We do hope you support us to produce this stunning coffee table book.

 Buy for yourself or a Gift and have a Gift Certificate emailed in December - email us with details.

story:
Greetings & Welcome

Hi my name is Sherry, I am an empath, tarot reader & spell caster. This is my very first deck creation. It has been a long dream of mine to create a wolf deck, with the help of a talented illustrator I can now bring forth THE WOLF TAROT DECK and with YOUR HELP WE CAN BRING IT TO LIFE!

The Funding Will Bring It To Life

Reaching the goal will bring this beautiful deck to life. There are awesome perks that go along with your donations. I'm sure you will just Howl over.

PERKS PERKS PERKS PERKS PERKS PERKS

Wolf Tarot Deck

 

 

 Hermit magnet : 2 X 3.5  Magnet  (50mm×89mm)

 

 Wolf Paw Mouse Pad : 6''×8'' (152mm×203mm)

 

 Wolf Tote Bag: 15''×15'' (381mm×381mm)

 

HOWL DEAL

 

 

Why Wolves

Besides being Native American Indian, my love of wolves, nature and all creatures, my connection is very deep with the wolf. Ancient cultures and indigenous people believed that animals and humans shared the same spiritual essence between each other.  They also believed that these animals are attracted to us and present themselves to us in specific moments of our lives to reveal messages. The wolf offers some of the most striking animal meanings in the realm of spirit animals. The power of the wolf brings forth instinct, intelligence, appetite for freedom, and awareness of the importance of social connections. 

Risks & Challenges

Only risk would be not meeting our goal to bring you this deck. Demo decks have been printed and as you see in the video there is some white along the top and bottom, but this is being revised by me (resizing cards) as I write this and another demo deck is being printed and all should be corrected.

How Can You Contribute  

Everyone can contribute to this campaign, you can share this campaign on social media, with family and friends. Getting the word out & your contributions will help reach the goal.

 

SKETCH DESIGNS

THE FOOL

story:
Who are you?

Hey! I've been an illustrator for quite some time. I am studying in the graphic design field and hope to further my skills throughout my time studying and outside of school. I really enjoy exploring other mediums so this project is me doing just that, all by myself!

What are you planning to make?

I am planning to make my very first enamel pin!

 

Where did this project come from?'

over the past 3 years, I have become a member of the hamster community and I see how much love and appreciation goes into these animals that need all the love and don't normally get it. that is why I want to make my first pin something I care about and for a community that deserves something nice for all the hard work they do.

What’s your plan, and what’s your schedule?

I have been discussing manufacturing costs with many companies and have been doing research figuring out my beat options. pin making is expensive so you want to make sure to get the best result possible. so once I get enough pre-orders through this kickstarter I will give the go-ahead and begin my order. the creating process may take a month or so with delivery but once done ill be shipping immediately.

What’s your budget?

Material: iron

Size: 1.25"

Process: hard enamel

Plating: silver

Attachment: a black rubber clutch

Unit price: $0.5

Mold fee：$40

Shipping fee: $24

total: $69 I would like to reach for a bit higher as the more pins made, the cheaper the cost. so I will be reaching for $130

Why do you care? I am a collector of pins and a hamster love and caretaker myself. so, of course, I myself wish to have a pin representing it all and a new addition to my collection and others

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this!
